page.title: 03ATTITUDES IN CALLANDER
page.content: Most of the {inhabitants}of this area put a high value on their quiet,residential life style.They really appreciate the beautiful { {scenery}which surrounds them and are generally tolerant of the tourists,accepting them as an inconvenient necessity. On the whole people are found to be very friendly and helpful,although there is sometimes a slight rivalry between 'locals' and 'newcomers'.It is jokingly said that one has to be resident for at least 40 years before being fully accepted. Dislikes about Callander are few.The Amusement Arcade is unpopular,except with its clients;underage drinking is worrying and the closing of the railway is thought to be a mistake.A few people are worried about their lack of privacy in the{small community
